C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: Google, IndentWidth: 4, UseTab: Never, NamespaceIndentation: All, ColumnLimit: 120, BinPackParameters: true, BinPackArguments: true, BraceWrapping: { AfterNamespace: false, AfterClass: false, AfterFunction: false, AfterControlStatement: false, BeforeCatch: false, BeforeElse: false } }
